mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to Virginia Tech shooting on April 16th, 2007, with response by someone claiming to be from Blacksburg ("Hoos For Hokies," when the Beta Bridge on UVA grounds was painted with this phrase in solidarity with the Virginia Tech community). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
UVA SUPPORTS VT | I'm from Blacksburg and "Hoos for Hokies" really meant a lot to us after 4/16.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crime
School shootings
Virginia Tech Shootings, Blacksburg, Va., 2007
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
